name: lansat-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its critical hit chance by one stage.
short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that ups the critical- hit rate in a pinch.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that ups the critical- hit rate in a pinch.
